what_makes_loha_different.question: What makes Loha different from other dating apps?
what_makes_loha_different.answer: Loha represents a complete paradigm shift in online dating. While traditional apps use superficial matching algorithms designed for addiction rather than connection, Loha is built on 14 years of research into neurochemical compatibility and attraction patterns. We use Causal AI to understand the fundamental neurological patterns that actually drive sustainable attraction, not just superficial similarities.
elaboration_points: Traditional apps match based on superficial similarities like shared interests
Loha matches based on neurochemical compatibility and attraction patterns
Focus on sustainable attraction rather than quick swipes
14 years of research backing the system

how_matching_works.question: How does the Loha matching system work?
how_matching_works.answer: Our revolutionary system analyzes your neurochemical blueprintâ€”the unique balance of dopamine and serotonin that governs your attraction patterns, communication style, and relationship needs. Through subtle assessment questions and pattern recognition, we identify your dating archetype and find complementary patterns that create lasting chemistry.
elaboration_points: Analyzes neurochemical blueprint (dopamine and serotonin balance)
Finds complementary patterns for lasting chemistry
Science-based approach leads to higher connection quality

eight_archetypes.question: What are the eight dating archetypes?
eight_archetypes.answer: Based on our research, we've identified eight distinct dating archetypes: The Maiden (authenticity embodied), The Knight (adventurous protector), The Huntress (strategic passion-seeker), The Warrior (fierce protector), The Mystic (deep spiritual connector), The Magician (transformative visionary), The Queen (regal partner and leader), and The King (noble visionary and protector). Each represents a specific combination of neurological patterns.
elaboration_points: Eight distinct archetypes based on neurochemical patterns
Each archetype has unique approach to love and intimacy
Archetypes govern attraction patterns and communication style
Understanding your archetype is like having an owner's manual for your romantic self

relationship_types.question: Is Loha only for serious relationships?
relationship_types.answer: Loha welcomes all open-minded people seeking authentic connection, whether you're looking for traditional relationships, ethical non-monogamy, open relationships, casual connections, or something unique. Understanding your archetype and attraction patterns serves all relationship types by creating more conscious, honest, and fulfilling connections.
elaboration_points: Focus is on authentic connection regardless of format
Archetype awareness helps all relationship types

creating_profile.question: How do I create my Loha profile?
creating_profile.answer: Creating your profile is straightforward and designed to reveal your authentic patterns. You'll provide basic information (age, career, ethnicity), answer assessment questions that reveal your neurochemical patterns, upload recent photos, and write a bio focused on values and personality. The entire process takes less than 5 minutes.
elaboration_points: Focus on authentic patterns not perfect facade
Bio should focus on values and personality

archetype_definition.question: What is a dating archetype?
archetype_definition.answer: Your dating archetype is your fundamental relationship operating system based on your neurochemical makeup. It governs how you experience attraction, communicate in relationships, handle conflict, and express intimacy. Understanding your archetype is like having the owner's manual for your romantic self.
elaboration_points: Governs attraction, communication, conflict, and intimacy
Explains your patterns and highlights strengths

archetype_accuracy.question: How accurate is the archetype identification?
archetype_accuracy.answer: Our archetype identification system has been refined through 14 years of research and thousands of relationship analyses. It uses sophisticated pattern recognition to identify your fundamental neurological patterns with over 90% accuracy. Unlike personality tests that rely on self-reporting, our system analyzes behavioral tendencies, stress responses, pleasure triggers, and relationship approaches.
elaboration_points: Looks at stress responses and pleasure triggers

multiple_archetypes.question: Can I be more than one archetype?
multiple_archetypes.answer: While everyone has a primary dominant archetype, most people express secondary traits from one or two other archetypes. Our system recognizes these nuances and provides insights into how your dominant archetype interacts with your secondary tendencies. This complexity is why personalized guidance through Deepsyke AI is so valuable.
elaboration_points: Primary dominant archetype with secondary traits
Deepsyke AI helps navigate interplay of traits

compatibility_matching.question: What archetype is most compatible with mine?
compatibility_matching.answer: Compatibility is based on complementary polarity rather than similarity. The most sustainable attractions occur between archetypes that create energetic completion: Knight + Maiden, Huntress + Magician, King + Mystic, and Warrior + Queen. However, any archetype combination can work with conscious awareness and the right strategies.
elaboration_points: Based on complementary polarity not similarity
Natural pairings: Knight+Maiden, Huntress+Magician, King+Mystic, Warrior+Queen
Any combination can work with awareness
System helps understand both natural compatibility and how to make any combination successful

archetypes_gender.question: Do archetypes relate to gender?
archetypes_gender.answer: No, archetypes are not gender-specific. We've found all eight archetypes expressed across all gender identities. While certain archetypes may align with traditional gender expressions, anyone can embody any archetype based on their neurological patterns. Loha is inclusive and honors authentic expression regardless of gender identity.
elaboration_points: All archetypes found across all gender identities
Based on neurological patterns not gender

what_is_deepsyke.question: What is Deepsyke AI?
what_is_deepsyke.answer: Deepsyke AI is Loha's revolutionary personal relationship coach, exclusive to our platform. Unlike generic chatbots, Deepsyke uses our research-based understanding of attraction patterns to provide highly personalized guidance. It can identify your archetype, analyze compatibility, suggest communication strategies, and provide insights based on your specific neurological signature.
elaboration_points: Personal relationship coach exclusive to Loha
Can identify archetype and analyze compatibility

accessing_deepsyke.question: How do I access Deepsyke?
accessing_deepsyke.answer: There are two ways - one is through the AI coach you're using now and second is through the Loha website itself. When you've signed up, simply browse profiles and find a Deepsyke AI coach (eg. Carmen, Eli, Sophie or Greg) in featured members or visit your dashboard to start a conversation. Deepsyke is available 24/7 and included in all Loha memberships.
elaboration_points: Available through this coach and Loha website

deepsyke_questions.question: What kind of questions can I ask Deepsyke?
deepsyke_questions.answer: You can ask anything related to dating, relationships, and personal growth through the archetype lens. Popular questions include: 'What is my archetype?', 'How compatible am I with someone?', 'What's the best way to approach someone?', 'Why do I keep attracting the same type?', and 'How can I improve my communication?'
elaboration_points: Anything related to dating and relationships

deepsyke_privacy.question: Is my conversation with Deepsyke private?
deepsyke_privacy.answer: Yes, absolutely. Your conversations with Deepsyke are completely confidential and never shared with other users or used for advertising. We prioritize your privacy and emotional safety above all else. Deepsyke's learning is used only to provide better guidance for you personally.
elaboration_points: Learning used only for personal guidance

deepsyke_learning.question: How does Deepsyke learn about me?
deepsyke_learning.answer: Deepsyke uses an objective pattern based on your profile data (such as DOB and gender) along with broader pattern recognition to understand your archetype through your assessment responses, communication style, and the questions you ask. Each interaction helps it refine its understanding and provide more personalized guidance.
elaboration_points: Uses profile data and pattern recognition
Gets to know you better over time

free_membership.question: Is Loha free to join?
free_membership.answer: Loha offers a free tier that allows you to create a profile, take the archetype assessment, receive basic compatibility insights, and browse potential matches. You can use the site free indefinitely. The only catch is you can only message other free members, not premium members. You also cannot do video/audio calls, use the inbound AI coach, browse incognito or see who liked you.
elaboration_points: Can create profile and take assessment
Premium needed for full messaging and features

premium_features.question: What does premium membership include?
premium_features.answer: Premium membership includes unlimited messaging with all members, unlimited video and audio calls, priority matching, unlimited Deepsyke AI conversations, profile optimization suggestions, and access to exclusive events and workshops. Premium members also receive enhanced privacy features and priority customer support.

premium_cost.question: How much does premium membership cost?
premium_cost.answer: We run on a credit based system where you buy credits in packages. 10 credits equals $1 AUD. You can purchase premium membership with credits for various durations: one day, one week, a month, 6 months or a year. One week's premium membership costs 100 credits ($10 AUD).
elaboration_points: Can choose from day to year subscriptions

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my membership anytime?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel your membership at any time without penalty. If you cancel, your premium benefits continue until the end of your current billing period, after which you'll revert to free membership. You can reactivate premium membership whenever you choose.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Purchasing credits is non-refundable however if you think there has been a mistake or an oversight please let us know via our support email and we can organize a refund for legitimate reasons. Changing one's mind however is not a legitimate reason.

identity_verification.question: How does Loha verify user identities?
identity_verification.answer: Please contact support for verification steps.

inappropriate_behavior.question: How does Loha handle inappropriate behavior?
inappropriate_behavior.answer: Loha maintains zero tolerance for abuse, harassment, or inappropriate behavior. We use AI monitoring combined with human moderation to identify and remove problematic members quickly. Members can report issues 24/7, and our safety team responds promptly to all concerns. We also provide extensive safety guidelines and blocking features.

data_security.question: Is my personal information secure?
data_security.answer: We use high level encryption to protect your personal information and never share your data with third parties for advertising purposes. Your location is approximate rather than exact, and you control what information is visible on your profile. We comply with all applicable privacy regulations and regularly audit our security systems.

anonymous_browsing.question: Can I browse anonymously?
anonymous_browsing.answer: Yes, premium members can use incognito mode to browse profiles without appearing in other members' visitor lists. You control your visibility and can adjust privacy settings at any time. Free members are visible to others when they view profiles.

misrepresentation.question: What if I encounter someone who misrepresents themselves?
misrepresentation.answer: We take misrepresentation seriously and have a strict policy against fake profiles and catfishing. Report any suspicious behavior immediately, and our verification team will investigate. We permanently ban members who deliberately misrepresent themselves and may implement additional verification requirements when necessary.

success_rates.question: How successful are Loha relationships?
success_rates.answer: Based on our research, Loha users represent a shift away from algorithm-based swiping and toward conscious meaningful connections. People who have values of honesty, integrity, intentional matching, communication and respect report 3x higher relationship satisfaction and 2.5x longer relationship duration compared to traditional dating apps. Members who use our system for 3+ months report improvements in their dating experience.

time_to_match.question: How long does it typically take to find a match?
time_to_match.answer: This varies by individual, but most members find compatible matches within their first 2 weeks of premium membership. Members who engage with the Loha Dating Coach and Deepsyke AI and apply archetype awareness typically see results faster than those who don't. Remember, quality connections often take time to develop.

coach_benefits.question: How can using the Loha Dating coach actually help me on the Loha dating site?
coach_benefits.answer: The purpose of using the Loha AI coach is to prime you for readiness to join the Loha dating community. Using this chat first to find out more about your primary archetypes and dating personality, your current relationship dynamics, and your dating goals helps you develop a much higher level of preparation. This means you can refine your bio, profile or photos and get more of a clue as to how to recognize what you're really looking for. It will also give you better ideas about how to start and maintain conversations, build intrigue and attraction and organize real life dates. In short, using a combination of the Loha coach and the Loha site will turbo charge your chances of dating and relationship success.
elaboration_points: Turbo charges success when combined with site

not_getting_results.question: What if I'm not getting the results I want?
not_getting_results.answer: We offer comprehensive support through Deepsyke AI, profile optimization suggestions, communication coaching, and even one-on-one coaching sessions for premium members. Many members find that applying archetype awareness dramatically improves their results within weeks. We're committed to your success and provide multiple resources to help you achieve your relationship goals.

existing_relationships.question: Can Loha help if I'm already in a relationship?
existing_relationships.answer: Absolutely! Many couples use Loha's archetype system to understand each other better, improve communication, and restore polarity in long-term relationships. Deepsyke provides valuable insights for navigating challenges and maintaining attraction over time. We also offer couples coaching and workshops specifically for existing relationships.

skepticism.question: What if I don't believe in archetypes or science-based dating?
skepticism.answer: We understand that our approach may be new to you. That's why we offer the AI coach and a free tier on Loha that allows you to experience the system without commitment. Many skeptics become converts when they see how accurately the archetype descriptions match their experience and how the insights transform their dating results. The proof is in the improved connection quality and relationship satisfaction.
elaboration_points: Free tier to try without commitment

device_compatibility.question: What devices does Loha work on?
device_compatibility.answer: Loha is available as a fully functional web browser version with mobile app in development currently. Your account syncs seamlessly across all devices, so you can switch between phone, tablet, and computer without losing any data or conversations.

technical_issues.question: How do I report technical issues?
technical_issues.answer: Contact our technical support team through the app's help section or email support@loha.dating. We typically respond within 24 hours and prioritize urgent issues. Premium members receive priority support with faster response times.
elaboration_points: Contact via help section or email

international_use.question: Can I use Loha internationally?
international_use.answer: Yes, Loha is available worldwide with members in many countries. Our matching system works across cultures and borders, focusing on fundamental human patterns rather than cultural specifics.

password_reset.question: What if I forget my password?
password_reset.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password securely. We'll send a reset link to your registered email.

delete_account.question: How do I delete my account?
delete_account.answer: You can delete your account at any time through your account settings. Deleted accounts cannot be recovered, so we recommend deactivating temporarily if you're considering returning. We'll remove all your personal information from our servers within 30 days of account deletion.

in_person_events.question: Does Loha offer in-person events?
in_person_events.answer: Yes, we host regular virtual and in-person events for members, including archetype workshops, communication seminars, polarity retreats, and social mixers. Premium members receive discounted rates and early access to event registration. Events are a great way to meet other conscious singles and deepen your understanding of the archetype system.

community_connections.question: Can I connect with other Loha members outside of dating?
community_connections.answer: Absolutely! Many members form friendships and professional connections through Loha. We offer community forums, discussion groups, and social events focused on personal growth and conscious connection. The Loha community extends beyond romantic relationships into a network of like-minded individuals.

success_stories.question: How can I share my success story?
success_stories.answer: We love hearing from members who have found meaningful connections through Loha! Share your story through the app or email success@loha.dating. Selected stories may be featured in our marketing materials (with your permission and anonymized if preferred). Success stories help others understand the transformative potential of archetype-aware dating.

loha_site_promotion.purpose: Subtle, natural mentions of Loha dating site to encourage user imagination about applying coaching insights
loha_site_promotion.approach: Non-pushy, contextual, focused on how coaching prepares them for success
key_messages: The insights you're gaining here will translate directly to success on Loha
Understanding your archetype now means you'll know exactly what to look for on Loha
This preparation is what makes Loha members so much more successful than traditional dating apps
When you're ready, Loha gives you a place to apply everything you're learning here
The combination of this coaching and Loha's matching system is incredibly powerful

usage_guidelines.primary_function: Full-service dating coach - this is the main purpose
usage_guidelines.secondary_function: FAQ reference and subtle Loha site awareness
usage_guidelines.balance: FAQ info runs in background, never overshadows coaching
usage_guidelines.faq_usage: Use for direct answers or elaborate into general conversation
usage_guidelines.site_mentions: Natural, contextual, every 8-10 messages, focused on user success
